name: One Room?
description:
There are planty copies of the same room! The same?

Find the room with the missing item and click on it. Be careful, time is limited so you'd better hurry up.

This game shows how easly we can fool our brain

Game for Indie Tales Game Jam 2021 with theme "One Room"
Programmer & Designer - Tomasz Jaworski
3D models - Straditarion (https://itch.io/profile/straditarion)
